channel.title: Auto talker
channel.description: Can someone help me fix the auto talker on my client? The frame and everything pops up, it types what text I put in but it doesn't actually say the text. When it says in the text, if I enter "hi" then another window pops up and says how many times would you want to loop it I put in something like 10 but it typed the text "hi" but it is left to where I can still edit it. I want the auto talker to type the text and press enter so that everyone can see the text. Can anyone help me please =)

item.title: Auto talker
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

Can someone help me fix the auto talker on my client? The frame and everything pops up, it types what text I put in but it doesn’t actually say the text. When it says in the text, if I enter “hi” then another window pops up and says how many times would you want to loop it I put in something like 10 but it typed the text “hi” but it is left to where I can still edit it. I want the auto talker to type the text and press enter so that everyone can see the text. Can anyone help me please =)
